title: Freljord Ivern
body:
I often browse the champion subreddits to see what they discuss because I find it to be interesting, and while browsing the [Ivern Mains sub](https://www.reddit.com/r/ivernmains/comments/5jymvn/freljord_ivern/) I found this beautiful concept for Freljord Ivern. I'd love to see this as his next skin. Anyways, here it is!
http://pre13.deviantart.net/ed3b/th/pre/f/2016/330/5/8/freljord_ivern_by_brotherbaston-dapnpjm.jpg

replies.body: I think the Daisy is fantastically awesome. The Ivern needs a little more. And by that, I mean a full mustache ala Braum and a full beard ala Olaf.

He is just fabulous! He looks like a supermodel! And Daisy with the little nest of poros is just genius! Not to mention super aodrable!

This skin NEEDS to happen! Alongside Haunted Ivern!

_**Almighty.**_
I wish it was themed after a  pine tree instead, with a pinecone and such. Would be a good theme for winter. You know, look like a Christmas tree
Wait but isn't Ivern already Freljordian ;D
Inb4 this is on the front of boards, because who wouldn't upvote that Poro nest?

> [{quoted}](name=SlayerTay6,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EAzM7zdE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-27T17:26:45.426+0000)
>
> Inb4 this is on the front of boards, because who wouldn't upvote that Poro nest?

I know right! The poro nest is such a nice touch imo.

Yes, I love this drawing! It is how I discovered the artist. I almost immediately subsricbed to his YouTube channel. Please Riot make this a skin!! I need Freljord Ivern in this game! I would buy it instantly!!!
Ivern in fur trim is even swaggier.
